title: 59.2 (LOA)
content:
Dace skips ahead along the trail, a puff of air lifting her briefly off the ground. “We’re still headed for the Plummet, right?” she asks over her shoulder. “Oura may already be there; you know how quickly she can hike!”

RANGERS CHOOSE

A) Continue accompanying Dace to the Plummet. Discard all   from Dace.

B) Some other time. Discard Dace. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
